H0.text: The Glen Frey song Danger Zone is used in which film. Beverly Hills Cop

H1.text: The Glen Frey song Danger Zone is used in which film. The Terminator

H2.text: The Glen Frey song Danger Zone is used in which film. Fast Times at Ridgemont High

H3.text: The Glen Frey song Danger Zone is used in which film. TopGun

A4.text: Kenny Loggins performed two songs on the soundtrack, 'Playing with the Boys', and 'Danger Zone'.

A5.text: After the release of Loggins's single 'Danger Zone', sales of the album exploded, selling 7 million in the United States alone.
